import { useState } from "react" import Button from "../Button/Button" const ContactForm = (props) => { // const {formMain} = props const [form, setForm] = useState('') // const [email, setEmail] = useState('') // const [number, setNumber] = useState('') // const [textarea, setTextarea] = useState('') // const handleNameInput = (e) => setName(e.target.value) // const handleEmailInput = (e) => setEmail(e.target.value) // const handleNumberInput = (e) => setNumber(e.target.value) // const handleTextareaInput = (e) => setTextarea(e.target.value) const validatedForm = () => { const parametros = { campo: {}, error: {}, valid: false } setForm(prev => [...prev, parametros]) } return (
) } export default ContactForm
